items.name: Dive Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon that live in the sea.

items.name: Dusk Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

items.name: Great Ball
items.description: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

items.name: Heal Ball
items.description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates any status problem.

items.name: Luxury Ball
items.description: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.

items.name: Nest Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokémon in the wild.

items.name: Net Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon.

items.name: Poké Ball
items.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system.

items.name: Quick Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a more successful catch rate if used at the start of a wild encounter.

items.name: Repeat Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon species that were previously caught.

items.name: Timer Ball
items.description: A somewhat different Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.

items.name: Dire Hit
items.description: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: Guard Spec.
items.description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokémon for five turns after use.

items.name: X Accuracy
items.description: An item that raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: X Attack
items.description: An item that raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: X Defense
items.description: An item that raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: X Sp. Atk
items.description: An item that raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: X Sp. Def
items.description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: X Speed
items.description: An item that raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: Air Mail
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of colorful letter sets. Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.

items.name: Bridge Mail D
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of a red drawbridge. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Bridge Mail M
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of an arched bridge. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Bubble Mail
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of a blue world underwater. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Flame Mail
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of a print of flames in blazing red. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Grass Mail
items.description: Stationery featuring a print of a refreshingly green field. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Harbor Mail
items.description: A Wingull-print Mail to be held by a Pokémon.

items.name: Space Mail
items.description: Stationery featuring a print the huge expanse of space. Let a Pokémon hold it for use.

items.name: Wave Mail
items.description: A Wailmer-print Mail to be held by a Pokémon.

items.name: Escape Rope
items.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

items.name: Honey
items.description: A sweet honey with a lush aroma that attracts wild Pokémon when it is used in grass, caves, or on special trees.

items.name: Max Repel
items.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.

items.name: Repel
items.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps after its use.

items.name: Super Repel
items.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps after its use.

items.name: Poké Doll
items.description: A doll that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokémon.

items.name: Awakening
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.

items.name: Burn Heal
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokémon that is suffering from a burn.

items.name: Fresh Water
items.description: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

items.name: Full Heal
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Full Restore
items.description: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Hyper Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.

items.name: Ice Heal
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It defrosts a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 80 points

items.name: Max Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It completely restores the HP of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Moomoo Milk
items.description: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.

items.name: Paralyze Heal
items.description: A spray-type medicine. It eliminates paralysis from a single Pokémon.

items.name: Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.

items.name: Revive
items.description: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokémon. It restores half the Pokémon's maximum HP.

items.name: Super Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

items.name: Calcium
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special Attack) stat of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Carbos
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

items.name: HP Up
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Iron
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Protein
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Zinc
items.description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Def (Special Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.
